guild.name: St Albans Board Games Club
guild.description:
Welcome to the St Albans Board Game Club. We are a friendly bunch and meet every week in two locations and also we hold monthly all day events which are open to all.

The club is a place where like-minded individuals with a passion for strategy, tactics and gaming can come together to enjoy their hobby. The Monday events are held every two weeks 7pm – 11pm at the St Mark's Church, Church Lane, Colney Heath, St Albans, Hertfordshire AL4.

The Wednesday events are held every two weeks 7pm – 11pm at the 3rd St Albans Scout Hut Oak Yard, Chene Drive, Waverley Road, St Albans, AL3 5PE. The dates alternate with the next one 27th May and so on.

We also hold monthly game days at the same Scout Hut and these run from 1pm – 11pm and involve lots of gaming of all types of games. The next all day event is 27th June.

The week nights are £2 and the all day game events are £5. This covers the hire of the halls.

We are more than happy to teach people games and help people through so please don't be worried about coming if you are new to board games.

Feel free to bring your games or just come along and play what is there. We play anything from quick easy card games to 3 hour long epics and anything in between.

Our sponsored shop is Meeple City. You can find them HERE: www.meeplecity.co.uk All Club members get a discount.

Here is a little review of our club that appeared on GeekSyndicate: http://geeksyndicate.co.uk/2013/10/10/gs-table-games-first-g...

Thanks Christophe


If you have any questions please do not hesitate to post them below or send me a message.

Hope to see you soon!
